Name: Torden
About the game: A 3rd person sword fest - use many form of melee attacks and spells to battle incoming horde of enemies coming your way. Featuring many uniques enemies with their own quirks which require quick reflexes and patience. Oh yeah, you can dash in this game too... Key Features : Skinny hero instead of buff dude (no bodyshaming). No offence to muscle guys out there reading this. Dozens of spells and melee attacks to choose from. Tough enemies with different variation of attacks, No blind button spamming to win fights - blink once and you are dead. Gorgeous stylized graphics. Urgghhh, you are still reading this? Please help a brother out and buy this game.(*sad music violin playing*)
